author: William Medina

review: Totally love my amazon tv!  As a prime member I would watch stuff on my laptop but now I just switch my hdmi on my tv and I am good to go. I have never had a bad experience with amazon (unlike apple) and this product lived up to all my expectations.  In fact I love it so much I bought the amazon phone and plan to switch out of my apple in spite of so many people dissing the phone.  Unfortunately, there seems to be some Amazon negativity out there which blinds people to the fact that the Amazon phone specs reveal obvious superiority over other smart phones.  But I digress, buy amazon fire tv.
author: A. Harwood "rosebud"

review: This is a great device and adds so much more to my TV Viewing.  Easy to setup.  I began using within 5 minutes of hookup.  My TV has only two HDMI ports.  One is used for the DirectTV feed and one was for the Blu-Ray.  Bought an HDMI switch to handle multiple inputs off of one port and it works great with the Fire TV device.
author: Thomas K Frazier

review: I really like this device.  I don't own a smart tv so I tried a few other devices before I found this one.  This one has the best WiFi speed and the game apps are cool.  The only downside is that the selection from Netflix is better than that of Amazon prime.
